name: Soul About
description:
Wonder around the screen avoiding baddies as long as you can but sooner or later death will find a way to reclaim you. 

Notes;

This game has no sound,yet and was made for trijam #54 but i ran out of time. Updates for sound will follow a day or two after submission.

Also i used a bunch of different fonts so if you notice a particular one you like comment down below
